name: Substrate must be clean and smooth, dry and free from dust or contaminants. All sharp points and loose materials to be removed.
Application of first layer of approved membrane
Application of second layer of approved membrane (where applicable)
Check that all laps are 100 > 150 (sheet membrane systems)
Check that all penetrations are sealed with applicable mastic and membrane
Checklist named with location or text box below or marked up drawing attached
Confirm appropriate Waterstop-RX is going to be used in relation to concrete thickness
Waterstop-RX has been installed as per Allco specifications
All parties aware of Waterstop-RX requirements with exposure to climatic conditions
Any extras - corflutes, drainage cells, etc
Checklist named with location or text box below or marked up drawing attached
Membrane appropriately laid on substrate with dark grey (woven) side up
100 mm overlap between each sheet, and stagger sheets end at a minimum of 300mm
Appropriate detailing done to external/internal corners
Penetrations detailed as per Allcos recommendations
Allguard has been installed as per Allco specifications
Setting out refer to drawing/ COS
Nurajack NM install follow manufacturer specification
Tile lippiness checked and to acceptable standard
Tile interlocked with each others, stable and not moving/rocking
Checklist named with location or text box below or marked up drawing attached
Allguard has been installed as per Allco specifications?
Checklist named with location or text box below or marked up drawing attached
Appropriate detailing done as per Allco specifications
All laps seam taped horizontally & vertically using Allco seam tape
Drainage coil has been placed 100mm from the floor/wall joint
Penetrations detailed appropriately using appropriate accessory Volclay products
Termination bar used on vertical & horizonal edges
Termination sealed off correctly (i.e. M2000, Cetseal)
Allguard has been installed as per Allco specifications
Clean all areas of dust and debris
Sealed all walls and floor corners
Water tested all bathrooms & Undertook flood testing - Visual inspection

Mapeband SA to wall and floor junction/ penetration

Mapenet 150 install with 1st coat waterproofing if using Mapelastic Smart

Full coverage of tiles with adhesive
Tile lippiness checked and to acceptable standard
Finishing trims & transition bars edge alignment
Adhesive fully cured and clean properly
Grout work properly into all joint
Silicone applied to a acceptable finish
